channel.title: Home on THE LAB
channel.description: Recent content in Home on THE LAB

item.title: Htwoo Core
item.description: Microsoft’s Fluent Design Language with better performance, higher accessibility standards and developer experience. Built by the community for the community. hTWOo is purely based on HTML/CSS/JavaScript

item.title: Htwoo React
item.description: Based on hTWOo core we also created a react component library. This version of hTWOo allow you to create your applications for Microsoft SharePoint, Teams and standalone applications even.

item.title: hTWOo Icons
item.description: Looking for all Microsoft Fluent Design icons? You can download all from one single source in hTWOo. hTWOo Icons also offer the possibility to add your custom icon sets. Right for your application in no time.

item.title: PnP Weekly 2022 - ep. 159
item.description: In their PnP Weekly Podcast, Stefan Bauer was talking about hTWOo and important news around web development.

item.title: HTWOO React - Getting Started
item.description: Julie Turner educates viewers about the new open-source HtwoO React library she created containing many atomic components built by Stefan Bauer

item.title: HTWOO Core - getting started
item.description: Check out the how to getting started video presented during a Microsoft 365 community call.

item.title: Cloud Show Fluent Design HTWOO
item.description: In this 407th episode, Andrew Connell chats with Stefan Bauer around his new hTWOo project, a 100% pure HTML & CSS implementation of Microsoft’s Fluent Design System.

item.title: Data protection in the context of this website
item.description: Cookies We ate them but all up but don’t need one. Google Analytics We want to improve our offer therefor this web page uses Google Analytics, a web analysis service of Google Inc, 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway Mountain View, CA 94043, USA (‘Google’) on the legal basis of the­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­ ­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­predominant able interest (analysis of website use). When using our website a connection is made via software to the servers of Google and data is transferred to Google servers, some of which are in the USA.

item.title: Media Owner and Publisher
item.description: N8D e.U. Ziedlergasse 10/32 1230 Vienna www: n8d.at LinkedIn: StfBauer … also Design, Concept and Implementation
